description: The McIntyre Ski Area Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask McIntyre Ski Area for the snow report
Alexa, ask McIntyre Ski Area for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for McIntyre Ski Area
shortDescription: The McIntyre Ski Area Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for McIntyre Ski Area.
